os module function wrappers than can work with both nimscript and regular target.

Procs

proc getCurrentDir(): string {...}{.raises: [OSError], tags: [].}
Retrieves the current working directory. 
proc paramStr(i: int): string {...}{.raises: [], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
Retrieves the i'th command line parameter. 
proc paramCount(): int {...}{.raises: [], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
Retrieves the number of command line parameters. 
proc getEnv(key: string; default = ""): string {...}{.raises: [], tags: [ReadEnvEffect].}
Retrieves the environment variable of name key. 
proc existsEnv(key: string): bool {...}{.raises: [], tags: [ReadEnvEffect].}
Checks for the existence of an environment variable named key. 
proc putEnv(key, val: string): void {...}{.raises: [OSError], tags: [WriteEnvEffect].}
Sets the value of the environment variable named key to val. 
proc delEnv(key: string) {...}{.raises: [OSError], tags: [WriteEnvEffect].}
Deletes the environment variable named key. 
proc fileExists(filename: string): bool {...}{.raises: [], tags: [ReadDirEffect].}
Checks if the file exists. 
proc dirExists(dir: string): bool {...}{.raises: [], tags: [ReadDirEffect].}
Checks if the directory dir exists. 
proc existsFile(filename: string): bool {...}{.raises: [], tags: [ReadDirEffect].}
An alias for fileExists. 
proc existsDir(dir: string): bool {...}{.raises: [], tags: [ReadDirEffect].}
An alias for dirExists. 
proc toExe(filename: string): string {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
On Windows adds ".exe" to filename, else returns filename unmodified. 
proc toDll(filename: string): string {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
On Windows adds ".dll" to filename, on Posix produces "lib$filename.so". 
proc listDirs(dir: string): seq[string] {...}{.raises: [OSError], tags: [ReadDirEffect].}
Lists all absolute paths for all subdirectories (non-recursively) in the directory dir. 
proc listFiles(dir: string): seq[string] {...}{.raises: [OSError], tags: [ReadDirEffect].}
Lists all the files (non-recursively) in the directory dir. 
proc rmDir(dir: string; checkDir = false) {...}{.raises: [OSError],
                                      tags: [WriteDirEffect, ReadDirEffect].}
Removes the directory dir. 
proc rmFile(file: string) {...}{.raises: [OSError], tags: [WriteDirEffect].}
Removes the file. 
proc mkDir(dir: string) {...}{.raises: [OSError, IOError],
                       tags: [WriteDirEffect, ReadDirEffect].}
Creates the directory dir including all necessary subdirectories. If the directory already exists, no error is raised. 
proc mvFile(source, dest: string) {...}{.raises: [OSError, IOError, Exception],
                                tags: [ReadIOEffect, WriteIOEffect].}
Moves the file from to to. 
proc mvDir(source, dest: string) {...}{.raises: [OSError, IOError],
                               tags: [ReadIOEffect, WriteIOEffect].}
Moves the dir from to to. 
proc cpFile(source, dest: string) {...}{.raises: [OSError, IOError],
                                tags: [ReadIOEffect, WriteIOEffect].}
Copies the file from to to. 
proc cpDir(source, dest: string) {...}{.raises: [OSError, IOError],
                               tags: [WriteIOEffect, ReadIOEffect].}
Copies the dir from to to. 
proc cd(dir: string) {...}{.raises: [OSError], tags: [].}
Changes the current directory. 
proc `~`(path: string): string {...}{.raises: [], tags: [ReadEnvEffect, ReadIOEffect].}
